title: Age.of.Empires.1997.Crossover.Linux.v2-Ecclesiast
description:
Name: Age of Empires
Type: Game
Developer: Ensemble Studios
Publisher: Microsoft
Year: 1997
Platform: Linux using Crossover
Version: 1.0c (without pre-game cinematics)
Crack: No-CD (already applied)
Wikipedia page: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Age_of_Empires_%28video_game%29

This is the classic Age of Empires, packaged as a Crossover archive (.cxarchive), so you'll easily be able to play it under Linux. Tested with Crossover 14.

This is a fixed version (the first torrent accidentally included the pre-game cinematics).

Instructions:
Install Crossover (https://www.codeweavers.com), and open it.
Select "Manage bottles" from the "Tools" menu.
Click "Add from archive", and select the Age of Empires archive file.
Start game from the menu in the Crossover applet or on your Linux desktop.

-Ecclesiast
